message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe is a perfect match for your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and value, it is worth $10000 to me. Considering its immense worth to both us and potential buyers, I kindly propose to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $9500. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a product that holds significant value and could potentially increase in worth over time. I trust this offer will be favorable to you, allowing us to collaborate on this valuable transaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information. I look forward to your positive response.
